```{r}
df = simul1(1000)
ggplot(df,
       aes(x, y,
           color = d_factor)) +
  geom_point() + 
  labs(color = "Treatment status")

fit <- lm(y ~ d_factor + x, data=df)
df$resid <- fit$residuals

ggplot(df,
       aes(resid, y,
           color = d_factor)) +
  geom_point() + 
  labs(color = "Treatment status")
```

```{r}
#simul 1,2
df <- simul3(1000)
ggplot(df,
       aes(x1, y,
           color = d_factor)) +
  geom_point() + 
  labs(color = "Treatment status")

ggplot(df,
       aes(x2, y,
           color = d_factor)) +
  geom_point() + 
  labs(color = "Treatment status")

ggplot(df,
       aes(x1, x2,
           color = d_factor)) +
  geom_point() + 
  labs(color = "Treatment status")

fit <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2, df)
summary(fit)

m.out <- matchit(d ~ x1 + x2, df, method = "quick", distance="glm")
m.dat <- match.data(m.out)

fit <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2, m.dat, weights = weights)
summary(fit)
```
